sulfurous.description: The air smells sulfurous, like burnt stone and brimstone hanging thick in your nose.

floral.description: The air smells floral, unnaturally sweet and out of place in this dark place.

metallic.description: The air smells metallic, sharp and cold, like blood on iron.

musty.description: The air smells musty, thick with age and the weight of forgotten dust.

rotting.description: The air smells of rot, like flesh and wood left too long in the dark.

sweet.description: The air smells sweet, sickly and cloying, like overripe fruit gone wrong.

ozone.description: The air smells of ozone, crackling and charged, like a lightning storm sealed in stone.

mossy.description: The air smells mossy, damp and earthy, like deep forest groves reclaimed by time.

parchment.description: The air smells of old parchment and ink, fragile knowledge long entombed.

blood.description: The air smells of blood, fresh and warm, as if something just died nearby.
